title: The Unexpected Heroism of Oscar Jackson

story.text: Oscar Jackson starts his week with typical counseling sessions. He meets a troubled teenager with mysterious emotional swings.
While tutoring a group of students in math, Oscar notices a pattern in the teenager's behavior that resembles old superhero comics he once loved.
Oscar spends his evening researching and connects the dots - the teenager might have supernatural abilities that manifest subconsciously.
Oscar meets with the teenager, sharing his findings. Surprisingly, his theories are correct. The teenager, feeling understood, opens up about struggling to control his powers.
Oscar uses his counseling skills to help the teenager manage his powers, employing emotional regulation techniques from his professional toolkit.
In a burst of new confidence, the teenager stops a small crime, with Oscar cheering from the sidelines. Oscar's belief in his gut feeling turns into a heroic reality.
The gratitude from the community fills Oscar with great pride. His humble life as a counselor and tutor had morphed into an unexpected role as a mentor to a budding hero.

ending: Sometimes, the heroes we need are just the ordinary people who choose to do extraordinary things.
